---
id: create-tag
title: "Create tag"
description: "This endpoint creates a new tag for a given property id in a space. The creation process is subject to rate limiting. The tag is identified by its unique identifier within the specified space. The request must include the tag's name and color. The response includes the tag's details such as its ID, name, and color. This is useful for clients when users want to add new tag options to a property."
sidebar_label: "Create tag"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"
info_path: docs/reference/2025-04-22/anytype-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import Translate from "@docusaurus/Translate";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create tag"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/spaces/{space_id}/properties/{property_id}/tags"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint creates a new tag for a given property id in a space. The creation process is subject to rate limiting. The tag is identified by its unique identifier within the specified space. The request must include the tag's name and color. The response includes the tag's details such as its ID, name, and color. This is useful for clients when users want to add new tag options to a property.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

</Heading>
